name: IMDb – Darkened
description: This is a darker version of IMDb that includes a fixed navigation bar. !!! Please Read !!! This userstyle is a work in progress, it will finish over time. If you find something that I have missed, please let me know! Or if you prefer the regular style of IMDb but want a fixed navigation bar, you can install it here; http://userstyles.org/styles/62290/imdb-fixed-navigation-position Please leave a rating if you liked the userstyle! =================== Your Feedback is Highly Appreciated! Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431

user.name: Crystallis
user.about: Commenting and rating is always appreciated. ツ
